meanings.definition: A place where incoming messages are stored.
meanings.sent1: I have many inboxes for my emails and messages.
meanings.sent2: My inboxes are always full of notifications and updates.
meanings.sent3: My inboxes are like treasure chests filled with surprises.
meanings.sent4: Her inboxes overflow with unread messages like a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The inboxes on my phone are like little mailboxes waiting to be opened.

meanings.sent1: She checked all her inboxes to make sure she didn't miss any messages.
meanings.sent2: The inboxes on his desk were neatly organized and labeled.
meanings.sent3: Having multiple inboxes can sometimes feel overwhelming.
meanings.sent4: The inboxes in the office seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent5: Inboxes can be like a collection of small containers holding different surprises.
